3. 4. We then check if this Microsoft application was released under the category of social networking. In the table, we find that Windows Live Messenger falls under the 'social networking' category.
5. Since all our checks point towards the same software (Windows Live Messenger), we now verify that it was indeed released on November 17th, but since there is no exact date in the table and the closest date provided is 2010-11-17, we cannot confirm this.
